item.title: 【Cinema Center】MOVIE - Air.Bud.1997.1080p.DSNP.WEB-DL.AAC2.0.H.264-Samuel
item.description:
Air Bud

Alternate Artwork 1 | Alternate Artwork 2 | Alternate Artwork 3 | Alternate Artwork 4 | Alternate Artwork 5 | Alternate Artwork 6 | Alternate Artwork 7 | Poster 1 | Poster 2 | Poster 3 | Poster 4 | Poster 5 | Thumbnail 1 | Thumbnail 2 | Thumbnail 3 | Key Art


1997 • 1h 38m
Sports, Family, Animals & Nature, Comedy

Description
While struggling to make the basketball team, a shy young student meets a stray golden retriever named Buddy with amazing basketball skills. Together they help take their school's team to the state finals, all while avoiding Buddy's greedy former owner.
Click to expand...
More Information
Long Description:
When 12-year-old Josh Framm finds himself in a new city with no friends, he's too shy to try out for the basketball team. But while practicing one day, he meets Buddy, a runaway golden retriever, who surprises him with his ability to score baskets. Josh and Buddy eventually make the school team, and the dog's extraordinary talents spark a media frenzy—one that attracts Buddy's greedy former owner, Norm Snively, who wants to cash in on the dog's notoriety. Josh and Buddy must keep one step ahead of the scoundrel—while at the same time rallying their school team to the state finals.
Duration: 1h 38m
Release Date: 1997
Genre: Sports, Family, Animals & Nature, Comedy
Rating:
Director: Charles Martin Smith
Starring: Michael Jeter, Kevin Zegers, Wendy Makkena, Eric Christmas, Brendan Fletcher, Norman Browning
